title: Login crash on submit
history: User clicks login and the application crashes. Error appears in authentication module. Multiple users affected.

title: Payment gateway timeout
history: Users cannot complete payments. Transaction fails after clicking pay button. API timeout error.

title: Profile page loading slow
history: Profile page takes 8-10 seconds to load. Happens for many users but no crash.

title: UI button misalignment
history: Login button is not centered on mobile devices. UI looks broken but functionality works.

title: Image upload crash
history: Uploading profile image crashes the app. File handler throws error.

title: Search not returning results
history: Search feature returns empty results even when data exists. Backend query issue suspected.
